package.name: Kvh_Simpleseo
package.summary: Simple Seo for Set Meta data on Fly
package.description:
SimpleSeo extension is use for set Dynamic Meta Data on Fly with a simple configuration
You can set Meta Title , Meta Keyword and Meta Description dynamic
Example if your product name is XYZ Product and you want to set meta title like Buy XYZ Product from ABC Brand then you can set it by set configuration like Buy [product_name] from [product_manufacturer] Brand
Instruction
1) Go to System > Configuration 2) Select Catalog from left bar 3) Select Simple Seo Section 4) If you want to set the meta data formula then and want to use category attributes like name then you have to use like this [category_name] Where category_ is the prefix and name is the category attribute, you have to use prefix category_ for category attributes and prefix product_ for product attribute, please check screenshot for more information
if you need any assistance for installation and configuration then contact us at kvhsolutions@gmail.com
